title: How to return Google Pixel Phone
content:

Everyday i have to charge it 3 to 4 times.
Sometimes i get issue like something went wrong when i open gallery.
Want to return this phone.Amazon is not showing return button as i crossed the return timeline son won't be able to place a refund option there.
